articles.title: James Webb Space Telescope takes captivating image of Galaxy NGC 6822 - HT Tech
articles.description: James Webb Space Telescope captures an amazing picture of Milky Way Galaxy's nearest neighbouring galaxy NGC 6822. The image reveals stunning findings.
articles.content: The European Space Agency has released a stunning picture of the Galaxy NGC 6822. This galaxy is known to be nearest to the Milky Way Galaxy. It was captured with the efforts of the Near-InfraRed Cam… [+2009 chars]
